name: Energy_Melee
display_help: You can use Energy Melee to power your blows with pure energy. These focused power attacks often Disorient opponents. Total Focus will enter Energy Focus uppon hitting an enemy. Barrage, Power Crash or Energy Transfer are empowered while under Energy Focus.
power_short_helps: Melee, DMG(Energy), Foe Disorient, Self -HP, Special
